badge.name: Bsc. Computer Science

criteria.narrative: Awarded for completing all required modules in the course "Bsc. Computer Science".

badge.description: Foundational concepts in computing and problem solving.

credentialSubject.name: Timon Omondi
credentialSubject.courseDescription: Foundational concepts in computing and problem solving.

demonstratedCompetencies.name: Memory Management Awareness
demonstratedCompetencies.description: Understanding how memory is allocated and managed during program execution.

demonstratedCompetencies.name: Process and Thread Reasoning
demonstratedCompetencies.description: Understanding concurrent execution using processes and threads.

demonstratedCompetencies.name: File System Interaction
demonstratedCompetencies.description: Ability to work with files and directories programmatically and at OS level.

demonstratedCompetencies.name: Programming Basics
demonstratedCompetencies.description: Ability to write basic programs using variables, control structures, and functions.

demonstratedCompetencies.name: Problem Decomposition
demonstratedCompetencies.description: Ability to break complex problems into manageable components.

demonstratedCompetencies.name: Algorithmic Thinking
demonstratedCompetencies.description: Ability to reason step-by-step to design correct and efficient algorithms.

demonstratedCompetencies.name: Algorithm Efficiency Analysis
demonstratedCompetencies.description: Ability to reason about time and space complexity of algorithms.
